abstract.para: This file contains the various measurements including some gonad weights of the fish captured in Lake NE15 (Itigaknit) during the summer of 1988.

intellectualRights.para: Acceptance and utilization of LTER data requires that:

listitem.para: The Principal Investigator be sent a notice stating reasons for acquiring any data and a description of the publication intentions.
The Principal Investigator of the data set be sent a copy of the report or manuscript prior to submission and be adequately cited in any resultant publications
A copy of any resultant publications should be sent to:Principal Investigator Ecosystems Center Marine Biological Laboratory Woods Hole, MA 02543

geographicCoverage.geographicDescription: Lake NE15 in Arctic Alaska, approximately 5km north of the Toolik Lake Research Station.

description.para:
For Archival Use:
DATE RECEIVED: Apr90 DATA FILE ENTERED BY: Julie Pallant DATA FILE VALIDATION: NAME: Julie Pallant DATE: 4Oct91

para.literalLayout: The fish in 1987 were captured from lake NE15 using five-panel experimental gill nets (similar to the ones used in the 86MCDTLC.WK1 file). The fish from 1988 were caught on conventional hook and line gear. The date, fish number, sex, and species were recorded as well as the total length, fork length, standard length, and weight. Whether or not the pectoral fin and otolith was taken was recorded. Whether or not the fish was sexually mature along with the gonad weight was also recorded.

Variable Variable descrip. Precis./Units Coded Missing (Y/N) Values SITE site of measurement y DATE date DDMMMYY n FISH # fish number n SPECIES species of fish n LT = lake trout GR = grayling TL total length mm n FL fork length mm n SL standard length mm n WT weight gm n OTO otolith removed (Y/N) n blank P1 pectoral fin removed (Y/N) n blank SEX sex of fish n blank RIPE ripe fish (Y/N) n blank GONAD WT. gonad weight gm n blank COMMENTS comments on data file n blank (12) CALCULATIONS Variable Formula
